type.name: WeatherCloudLayer
type.summary: Represents one of the 32 layers of clouds.

property.name: Alphas
property.summary: Gets or sets the alpha channels of this cloud layer.

property.name: Colors
property.summary: Gets or sets the colors of this could layer.

property.name: IsEnabled
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether this cloud layer is enabled.

property.name: SpeedX
property.summary: Gets or sets the X-axis speed of this could layer.

property.name: SpeedY
property.summary: Gets or sets the Y-axis speed of this could layer.

property.name: Texture
property.summary: Gets or sets the texture of this cloud layer.
